amendment.description: Amendment sought to strengthen energy infrastructure resiliency and improve energy efficiency by incentivizing local renewable thermal (heating and cooling) energy and waste heat such as combined heat and power and by providing technical assistance to eligible entities to establish distributed energy systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 247 (Roll no. 662).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 247 (Roll no. 662).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Castor (FL).
